content.new:
Per #354,#355 I zeroed out kp_velocity and successfully switched my controller to STAND (to match starting state of simulator) without causing simulator to "blow up".

When I switch to MANIPULATE, the robot begins to shimmy off in forward direction.

issue.title: Atlas_v3_v1 sandia slides off into sunset when you switch to manipulate

message.raw:
We found a an issue with the k_effort vector getting overwritten on our side that was causing a periodic disturbance to the robot.

I suspect this caused the distance travel we saw, but there still seems to be an "over excitability" to this model.
